result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

and notice of DNA and witness list - State's
Status conference on September 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Information was E-filed with the court and a copy was given to the defendant; Defendant waived reading of Information; Defendant stood mute, Court enters plea of Not Guilty; motions due in 20 days; bail continued.

Atty. Tracey Lencioni on behalf of Atty. Johnson. State calls Dane County Deputy J. Lussman, sworn. Direct. Cross. Deputy identifies defendant.  Witness excused.  State moves for bind over, waives argument. Defense objects, waives argument.  CT: finds probable cause and does bind over.
Preliminary hearing on August 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.

01:50 PM Attorney Amy M Johnson in court on behalf of defendant.  Trisha L Simmons appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel waived defendant's appearance and asked for a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 09:30 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Status conference on July 11, 2022 at 01:40 pm.

02:57 PM Defendant in court, in custody.  Will R Davis appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Joseph B Balcarcel appeared by video means.  Defendant has contact SPD, but no has came to see him in the jail.  Defendant was told to try to contact SPD again to see if Amy Johnson can be appointed on this case too as she is his attorney on other cases.  Case rescheduled.  Status conference scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 01:40 pm.
Status conference on April 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

- Defendant shall complete the booking/fingerprinting process if required. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Danial P except only as required by jail movement or procedures. 
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.

02:31 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Amy M Johnson.  Cecilia E DeMarco appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties by Zoom. The defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Status conference scheduled for April 25, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
